observation_text: In the official advertised programmes, Dortmund and Muenster were the only German stations taking the Langenberg dance music on that night. It is, of course, quite possible that another German station took the same entertainment. Your estimation of W.L. would point to either Koenigsberg or Nuremberg, but these transmitters were apparently doing their own programmes.
full_text: Withypool: In the official advertised programmes, Dortmund and Muenster were the only German stations taking the Langenberg dance music on that night. It is, of course, quite possible that another German station took the same entertainment. Your estimation of W.L. would point to either Koenigsberg or Nuremberg, but these transmitters were apparently doing their own programmes.
